short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disguises your tabs in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Disguiser is a chrome extension that will mask your tab's title and icon to a specific website of your choosing, while retaining the content. With this extension, you may also abort your current tab to another tab quickly.

To edit the websites the extension uses, press the extensions button and select "Tab Disguiser." 

Keybinds:
     Abort Tab- Alt + X
     Abort Last Tab- Alt + Shift + X
     Disguise Tab- Alt + S

VERSION 1.1.0:
- Updated, more responsive and understandable popup interface
- Modified shortcuts to prevent collision with the default chrome commands
- Ability to toggle shortcuts
- Fixed bugs related to triggering shortcuts
